body:
New recipes for python packages:
* py-yolk3k
* py-sphinx-removed-in
* py-sphinx-gallery
* py-recommonmark
* py-commonmark
* py-colorspacious
* py-sphinx-copybutton
* py-sphinxcontrib-trio
* py-sphinxcontrib-mermaid
* py-python-json-logger
* py-python-docs-theme
* py-pygments-pytest
* py-hieroglyph
title: Python pkg recipes
